text.sentence: I understand that you will have an Amel at the Ft.
Lauderdale boat show next month.
Do I need an appointment to see the boat?
text.signature: Mark Taylor Vice President and General Counsel Enron Wholesale Services 1400 Smith Street - EB3892 Houston, Texas 77008 (713)853-7459 (713)646-3490 (fax)

text.sentence: Dear Mark: No appointment is needed but Trade Day (Thursday) is usually best/least busy day to come aboard.
Shall I send you some tickets for that day?
If you would like them please send me your mailing address.
text.signature: Best Regards, Joel F. Potter Cruising Yacht Specialist Amel's Sole Associate for the Americas

text.sentence: Joel: Thanks for your note back.
Unfortunately I don't get into town until quite late on Friday evening so Saturday and Sunday are the only days I can make it.
Do you know yet where you'll be located?
Dear Mark: Thank you for your email.
We will be located at Pier 66, dock C-64.
If you would like I can send you boat show tickets for Saturday and Sunday to your office address that you have listed.
Or if you prefer we can send them elsewhere.
Please let us know.
text.signature: Best Regards, Vela for Joel F. Potter Cruising Yacht Specialist Amel's Sole Associate for the Americas

text.sentence: Thanks Vela.
My office address is fine.
Just so you know ahead of time what some of my questions will be:
1.I'm a little concerned about the safety of in-mast furling systems generally.
What happens if it jams in a blow?
2. Are the heads both electric?
Will they operate manually if you lose power?
3. The boat seems remarkably well equipped.
What sorts of additional items are usual to purchase before she's ready to cruise?
4. How do U.S. owners deal with the voltage issues and electrical repairs and replacements?
5. Finally, and I suppose of least importance, I'm not thrilled with the teak-look deck or the blue cabin sole.
Any hope of a manufacturing change?
Thanks again and I'm looking forward to seeing you in Ft.
Lauderdale!
Hi Mark: I'll put the tickets in the mail today.
Joel will be happy to answer any and all of your questions when you see him on the boat.
He is at the Annapolis boat show now until 10/11.
We are looking forward to seeing you on the boat in Fort Lauderdale.
text.signature: Best Regards, Vela for Joel F. Potter Cruising Yacht Specialist Amel's Sole Associate for the Americas
